message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9500.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $8200. It's a great compromise that still benefits both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to get as close to my budget as possible.

I understand your desire to get as close to your budget as possible, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for $7800. It's a great compromise that still benefits both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my target. I'm willing to meet you halfway from $7800, so I'd like to offer $7400. I'm hoping we can finalize the deal at this price.
I understand your target price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for $7500. It's a great compromise that still benefits both of us.
